title: Clubhouse is finally rolling out dark mode support to its users on iOS and Android
content:
Live audio platform Clubhouse announced this week that it is finally rolling out dark mode support to its users on iOS and Android, so they can use the Clubhouse mobile app with a dark interface. However, it will still take some time before the option becomes available to all users.

moreâ€¦

The post Clubhouse is finally rolling out dark mode support to its users on iOS and Android appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Clubhouse app will now offer support for dark mode, but it will take some time before the option becomes available to all users.
